Name: Native Problems
About the game: 'Native Problems' is a 2D top down game about an Indian who beats the souls in the form of skulls towards the evil spirits that are chasing the player. With every new level, evil spirits become stronger and angrier, and you need to have time to save ladies and stay alive. A brave warrior from a great tribe accidentally summons evil spirits and now he needs to fight them off, saving accidentally lost madams along the way. Game Features: Nice Pixel Art style Increasing Difficulty Cool OST Steam Achievements support Family friendly gameplay
